title: Quests
content:
The Wizard of Waterdeep In Case of Death... Balthazar's Experiment Wyll The Blade of Frontiers The Grand Duke Lae'zel The Githyanki Warrior Karlach Our Fiery Friend The Hellion's Heart Jaheira The High Harper

Companion Quests in Baldur's Gate 3 are exclusive to Companions and their individual story will advance if you complete these quests. Completing these quests will also grant you rewards, experience, and you will also loot a lot of new equipment during the exploration and battles that are r
